title: Particle motion behavior from velocity function

content.question: A particle moves on the x-axis with velocity given by v(t) = 3t4 − 11t2 + 9t − 2 for −3 ≤ t ≤ 3 . How many times does the particle change direction as t increases from to −3 to 3?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
